title: Machine learning for skin lesion detection
abstract: We trained a convolutional neural network to classify skin lesions using dermoscopic images.

title: Mental health trends in adolescents
abstract: Survey data from 5,000 teenagers reveal rising anxiety and depression linked to social media use.

title: Renal transplant outcomes in diabetics
abstract: This study compares graft survival rates in diabetic vs. non-diabetic kidney transplant recipients.

title: Immunotherapy in melanoma patients
abstract: Checkpoint inhibitors were evaluated in advanced melanoma cases with promising survival rates.

title: Sleep apnea and cardiovascular risk
abstract: Polysomnography data show strong correlation between sleep apnea severity and hypertension.
